title: Innovations in Water Law and Policy Fellowship in Honor of David L. Harrison
description: To provide a fellowship to be awarded to a second or third year law student at CU with interest in water resources law and policy for work on a project proposed by The Nature Conservancy.
marketingContent: Fellowship to be awarded to one second or third year law student at CU with interest in water resources law and policy for work on a project proposed by The Nature Conservancy (project focus will be outside the U.S., to the extent practical).
